dmca.title: DMCA. Active pracy at your servers.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Cathcart [mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2006 7:52 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA. Active pracy at your servers.

To whom it may concern

Dear Sirs,

As the legal assistant of Artvertex, Inc (http://templatemonster.com), I am
instructed to provide you with the following report.
We have got a piracy report that lead http://www.shopthietke.com website.

It has come to our attention that your or one of your customer's servers IP
address (69.93.196.118), is involved in a grave situation of unauthorized
distribution intellectual and graphic property.

Site http://www.shopthietke.com sells stolen web design materials. These
sales have no license support documentation from the design owning company
and general website content confirms a malicious intent against our company.
The exact placements of infringement are
http://www.shopthietke.com/showroom/

These galleries contain recompiled sources which were ripped from an
original pre-view pages at http://TemplateMonster.com website. All stolen
sources numbers are corresponding to products numeration of an original
vendor.

We performed a direct contact with the site owner using his site contact
form and WHOIS database contact records.
According to WHOIS data, http://www.shopthietke.com  site owner is a citizen
of Vietnam and all the record fields are seemed to be filled correctly.
However all contact records lead to the x9vietnam.com (name server of the
illegal web store). http://x9vietnam.com is not the hosting service but the
cover page, made from the stolen cliparts. Website contact form gave no
respond at the given term.

Because of the obvious Templatemonster products distribution, we direct your
attention to the terms of our company's License Agreement
(http://www.templatemonster.com/terms.php) which clearly prohibits the
reselling of our products by any potential or current customer.

Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright -
2002-2005 Artvertex, Inc." The permission of  information publishing actions
from your server is illegal. Templatemonster.com website content cannot be
reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or medium and is therefore
making you posses illegal material. US copyright laws protect all parts of
this material.
The owner of this website has been notified of his actions, and has been
told the consequences. He ignored a feedback request confirming that his
site is illegal and canceling the amicable case solution.

Hence, we demand the immediate removal of http://www.shopthietke.com account
from your company server and cease the distribution of any of our products
IMMEDIATELY.
We have already notified our corporate lawyers of this situation and we
shall not hesitate to exercise our legal right to pursue this matter in a
court of law should you fail to meet our demand immediately.

Templatemonster.com is committed to investigating licensing infractions not
only to protect our own interests but to protect those of the designers who
submit their designs to us as well. We are contractually obliged to protect
the intellectual property rights and livelihood of the artists whose work we
license. While we support freedom of expression, we must enforce our
licensing conditions rigorously in order to meet our responsibilities. We
feel that your cooperation regarding this matter is fully warranted, and
expect it will be promptly forthcoming.

Thank you and waiting for your prompt answer.
----
Very truly yours,
Ryan Cathcart
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
Tel:  15183208716
FAX:  19175913014
mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com

note: DMCA form complain and screenshot attached.
